https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/defin._instruction: Add the file in which this image is stored in.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/voxel._instruction: Add two or three values with units defined that describe the size of one pixel (2D: [x, y]) or voxel (3D: [x, y, z]) in the physical space.
